ComicInfo.Title: Revenge Is Sweetie; Dirty Dancing
ComicInfo.Summary:
Get your dance shoes on because Pig-Pen is bringing the moves! “Dirty Dancing” and tons more fun, including classic Charles M. Schulz Sunday strips are bursting from the pages of this new issue of Peanuts.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Charles M. Schulz (a) & Paige Braddock (d) | 1 | RE | BOOM! Studios Exclusive "First Appearance" Cover (The Little Red-Haired Girl) | Charles M. Schulz (a) & Nomi Kane (d) | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-12 16:44:13. [CVDB482745]

ComicInfo.Colorist: Bill Bedard, Justin Thompson, Katharine Efird, Lisa Moore
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Charles M. Schulz, Nomi Kane, Paige Braddock
ComicInfo.Editor: Alex Galer, Alexis E. Fajardo, Rebecca Taylor, Shannon Watters
ComicInfo.Characters: Charlie Brown, Linus van Pelt, Pig-Pen, Sally Brown, Snoopy
